hadiths.text: It was narrated that Busr bin Jahhash Al-Quraishi that :the Prophet (ﷺ) spat in his palm then pointed to it with his index finger and said: “Allah (SWT) says: 'Do you think you can escape from My punishment, O son of Adam, when I have created you from something like this? When your soul reaches here' - and (the Prophet (ﷺ)) pointed to his throat - 'You say: I give charity.' But it is too late for charity?”

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الإِمْسَاكِ، فِي الْحَيَاةِ وَالتَّبْذِيرِ عِنْدَ الْمَوْتِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Withholding While Alive, Only To Squander Upon One's Death
